Solution Manager Module

solution_manager.completed_solutions_stack = []

List containing solved path problems.

solution_manager.check_solution_stack(path_problem)

Checks if this path problem was already solved and returns the solution to it.

Parameters

path_problem¶ (PathProblem) – Path problem to solve.

Returns

Solution if found in stack, else None.

solution_manager.get_solution(path_problem, draw_debug=False)

Wraps functions check_solution_stack() and find_path to look for a solution to the given path problem.

Parameters

  • path_problem¶ (PathProblem) – Path problem to solve.

  • draw_debug¶ (bool) – See draw_debug in find_path

Returns

Solution when a solution was found, else None.
